title: Work Permit Multi-Step Form Complete Flow
description: Verify that a permittee can complete the multi-step work permit form, with progress saved in localStorage, and submit successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to Nuevo Permiso work permit page
Fill out initial step of the form with valid data
Check that localStorage has saved the entered form data
Proceed to next step and fill in all mandatory fields
Form validations pass and allow progression to next steps
Complete the final step of the permit request form and submit
Confirm success message is displayed and permit data is saved

title: Work Permit Form Validation - Conditional Gas Testing Requirement
description: Ensure that the form enforces mandatory gas testing data when the permit type is Hot Work or Confined Space Entry.

steps.description: Open Nuevo Permiso form and select 'Hot Work' as permit type
Attempt to proceed without entering gas testing information
Form displays validation error for missing gas testing data and blocks progression
Fill in valid gas testing data
Validation error disappears and user can proceed
Repeat above steps selecting 'Confined Space Entry' permit type
Gas testing data is again required and validated similarly

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement for Work Permit Authorization
description: Verify that only Safety Officers can authorize or close permits, enforcing segregation of duties.

steps.description: Log in as a Permittee user
Attempt to access permit authorization or closure actions
Access denied or UI options are disabled for these actions
Log out and log in as Safety Officer
Access pending permits and perform authorization and closure
Actions succeed with digital signature capture and permit status updates

title: Persistence of Work Permit Form Data in localStorage on Page Refresh
description: Ensure that partially completed form data in the work permit form persists in localStorage and is restored upon page reload to prevent data loss.

steps.description: Navigate to Nuevo Permiso form
Fill form fields up to step 2
localStorage contains current form data
Reload the page
Form fields repopulate with data from localStorage

title: Incident Reporting Real-Time Update Verification
description: Verify that incidents submitted through the reporting interface appear in real-time on relevant user dashboards within specified latency thresholds.

steps.description: Log in as any user and navigate to Ocurrio Asi page
Submit a new incident report with valid data
Incident appears immediately in incident list with latency under 120ms for API and 27ms for DB queries
Confirm that the incident also updates on Dashboard page
Dashboard reflects the newly reported incident without delay

title: Personnel Management CRUD Operations
description: Test create, read, update, and delete operations for field personnel profiles via the personnel management module.

steps.description: Log in as Administrator or authorized user
Navigate to Personal management page
Create a new personnel profile with valid details
New personnel appears in list with correct details
Edit the personnel profile and update some fields
Changes are saved and displayed accurately
Delete the personnel profile
Personnel is removed from the list without errors

title: Dashboard Key Metrics and Task Display Integrity
description: Verify that the Dashboard displays accurate and up-to-date HSE metrics and active operational tasks to users based on their roles.

steps.description: Log in as each role: Admin, Safety Officer, Supervisor, Permittee
Access Dashboard page
Dashboard shows correct HSE metrics and tasks relevant to the logged-in user's role
Metrics are updated in real-time reflecting changes such as new permits and incident reports

title: Secure Document Access via Signed URLs
description: Test that access to stored permits and reports via signed URLs is restricted properly and URLs expire as configured.

steps.description: Request signed URL for a sensitive document as an authorized user
Access to document is granted when using valid signed URL
Attempt to access document with expired signed URL
Access is denied due to URL expiration
Attempt to use signed URL from unauthorized user account
Access to the document is blocked per row-level security policies

title: Digital Signature Capture and Printable Document Generation
description: Verify that Safety Officers can capture digital signatures in base64 format and generate printable permit documents with correct window communication.

steps.description: Log in as Safety Officer
Open pending permit and use signature capture component to sign
Signature image is captured in base64 format and saved with permit data
Trigger document generation for printable permit
Printable document opens in new window and contains signature and permit data formatted correctly

title: Report Export to PDF and Excel with Branding and Data Aggregation
description: Validate that reports exported include corporate headers, formatted rows, and correctly aggregated data grouped by cost centers and service orders.

steps.description: Generate report with sample permits, incidents, and personnel data
Export report as PDF
PDF contains corporate branding, headers, and well formatted grouped data
Export report as Excel
Excel file contains correct aggregated data by cost centers and service orders with corporate identifiers

title: Role-Based Access Denied Actions Verification
description: Confirm that only authorized roles can perform restricted platform actions (e.g., system configuration, personnel management, permit approvals).

steps.description: Log in as user with Supervisor or Permittee role
Attempt to access system configuration and personnel management pages
Access is denied or components are hidden
Log in as Administrator
Access system configuration and manage users and roles
Access granted and all functionalities are available

title: Permit Lifecycle Compliance with IS 17893:2022 Standard
description: Validate that all stages of permit lifecycle (initiation, validation, authorization, execution, closure) comply strictly with IS 17893:2022 requirements using defined workflows and validations.

steps.description: Initiate a new work permit with required data as per standard
Permit initiation captures all mandatory details according to IS 17893:2022
Submit permit for validation with automatic conditional checks
Form blocks completion if validations do not meet standard criteria
Authorize permit by Safety Officer capturing required approvals and signatures
Authorization step enforces segregation of duties and captures signatures
Mark permit as executed and later closed with final remarks
Permit lifecycle updates status correctly and audit trails are generated

title: User Registration and Admin Approval Workflow
description: Verify that a new user registration results in an 'Inactive' status, prevents login until approved, and allows an Administrator to activate the account.

steps.description: Register a new user via the Registration page
User sees 'Account Pending Approval' message upon success
Attempt to log in with the new unapproved account
Login is denied with an appropriate error message about pending approval
Log in as an Administrator
Navigate to Personnel management and find the new user
Update the user status to 'Active'
Log out and attempt to log in as the new user again
Login is successful and user is redirected to the dashboard
